data.message: Hi! Can you please help me. I make so many facebook and then i forget my password. How to delete my old facebook?

replies.message: Hi, Gude. It's against the Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. You can close or recover an old account. Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/231208473756221. -Rhea
